meta.title: Umukino wa buri munsi
meta.description: Tekereza ijambo ryihishe muri 6 rigerageza (cyangwa rike). Igikurushwa gishya kiraboneka buri munsi!
meta.keywords: Icyongereza, puzzle, ijambo, gukina, umukino, kumurongo, tekereza, buri munsi

help.title: Uko bakina
help.text_1_2: Buri wese akeka agomba kuba ijambo ryamagambo atanu yemewe. Kanda buto yinjira kugirango utange igitekerezo cyawe.
help.text_1_3: Nyuma yo gukeka, amabati azahindura ibara kugirango yerekane inyuguti zijambo ryawe ariko cyangwa hafi yayo.
help.text_2_1: iri mu Ijambo kandi ahantu heza!
help.text_2_2: iri mu Ijambo, ariko ntabwo iri ahantu heza.
help.text_2_3: ntabwo ahari mu Ijambo ugerageza gukeka.
